English: I can drive a car (I know how).
I can drive a car (I am able, nothing stops me).
I can drive a car (I'm allowed, I have a license).
I can't drive a car (I never learned).
Hungarian: Nem tudok autót vezetni (nem tanultam meg).

English: I can't drive a car (I broke my leg, or no car available).
I can't drive a car (I'm not allowed).
I can swim (I am able now, unrestricted).
I can swim (I'm allowed, my mom said yes).
I can't swim (I don't have a swimsuit, or there's no pool).
I can't swim (I'm not allowed, e.g. teacher said no).
I can play the guitar (I know how).
I can play the guitar (I have the guitar here, nothing prevents me).
I can play the guitar (I'm allowed, parents said yes).
I can fly a plane (I have the skill, I trained).
I can fly a plane (there's a plane available and I'm fit to do it).
I can fly a plane (I have a pilot's license).
